content:
DBinding Interface

Definition

Provides a managed equivalent of the DBinding interface from the Microsoft Data Binding Collection library (msbind) for use in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
public interface DBinding

Remarks

Note

Functions and objects in the N:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Properties

DataChanged

Gets or sets a value indicating that data has changed.

public bool DataChanged { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if data has changed; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Note

Functions and objects in the N:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

DataField

Gets a data field.

public string DataField { get; }
Value
String

A String that contains the data.

Remarks

DataFormat

Gets or sets the data format for a data field.

public Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp DataFormat { get; set; }
Value

An IDataFormatDisp interface.

Remarks

In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Gets the key value for a data field.

Value
String

A String that contains the key value.

Value

Remarks
